code: import React from'react';import{addMessageCreateAction}from"../../../redux/dialogsReducer";import Chatbar from"./Chatbar";import{connect}from"react-redux";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{messagesPage:state.messagesPage};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addMessage:function addMessage(newMessageBody){dispatch(addMessageCreateAction(newMessageBody));}};};var ChatbarContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Chatbar);export default ChatbarContainer;
